mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, READCOUNT, DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE FROM PDS ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PDS(SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, READCOUNT, DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_PDS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename}, 0, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE PDS SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, FILENAME=#{filename}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
